“ Take them off , ”[35-he] [he]35-he said in a deadly calm voice . “ Not on [your]35-he life , ”[35-he] [she]36-she spat back but [her]36-she words were bellied by the breathless quality to [her]36-she voice . [He]35-he walked up to [her]36-she and yanked the shirt off , then tossed [her]36-she on the bed , which caused [her]36-she to gasp . [He]35-he pulled [her]36-she jeans off next , leaving [her]36-she in nothing but [her]36-she bra and panties . [She]36-she was incredibly grateful [she]36-she was wearing one of the pairs [the girls]37-the girls had made [her]36-she get or [she]36-she was sure [he]35-he would ’ve ripped those off as well . [She]36-she was breathing heavily , as [his]35-he eyes raked over [her]36-she exposed skin . Catching [her]36-she by surprise , [he]35-he stooped down and grabbed the clothes [he]35-he ’d taken off [her]36-she , then walked out of [the room]38-the room . It took [her]36-she a few moments before the shock wore off and then [she]36-she went in search of something to cover [herself]36-she . [She]36-she could n’t go chasing [him]35-he through [the house]39-the house in nothing but [her]36-she underclothes . By the time [she]36-she got a robe on and followed [him]35-he down [the stairs]40-the stairs , [she]36-she could n’t find [him]35-he anywhere . Suddenly a smell hit [her]36-she and [she]36-she gasped again . [He]35-he would n’t dare , [she]36-she thought , as [she]36-she made a dash towards [the back yard]41-the back yard . [Her]36-she eyes widened in shock and fury , as [she]36-she saw what [he]35-he was doing . [She]36-she came running out the door and [he]35-he turned and gave [her]36-she a victorious smile . [He]35-he was standing in front of the huge fire pit [they]42-they used for bonfires and [her]36-she clothes were going up in flames . [She]36-she could n’t believe [he]35-he would burn [her]36-she clothes . [He]35-he must ’ve doused them in gasoline first because the flames were huge . There was no chance [she]36-she could salvage them . “ How dare [you]35-he burn [my]36-she clothes , ”[36-she] [she]36-she yelled , fury making [her]36-she see red . [He]35-he then winked at [her]36-she . [She]36-she wanted to claw [his]35-he eyes out . [She]36-she was so mad , [she]36-she was beyond reasonable thinking . [The staff]43-the staff had seen what was going on and had all scurried away , [no one]44-no one brave enough to come between the two of [them]42-they in the middle of a fight . “ [I]35-he do whatever [I]35-he want to do , ”[35-he] [he]35-he said in a mocking voice . “ Well [you]35-he know what ? Let ’s just add more fuel to the fire , ”[36-she] [she]36-she shouted . [She]36-she ripped off [her]36-she robe and tossed it in the flames .

Prologue [Ryan Titan]7-ryan looked around at [[his]7-ryan empty home]61-his empty home with satisfaction . [He]7-ryan ’d watched [[his]7-ryan two cousins]62-his two cousins settle down over the last couple of years , going from [[Seattle]1-seattle ’s most eligible bachelors]63-seattle ’s most eligible bachelors to [happily married men]64-happily married men and now [he]7-ryan was left feeling like [he]7-ryan was missing something . Chapter One [Nicole Lander]12-nicole parked [[her]12-nicole car]110-her car , saying a prayer of thanks it had once again made it [home]111-home . [She]12-nicole was grateful each time [she]12-nicole turned the key and the engine decided to turn over and work for another day . [She]12-nicole climbed the broken staircase , careful to not lean against the rusted out railing . [She]12-nicole ’d made that mistake once and had almost fallen through . The only thing that saved [her]12-nicole had been [her]12-nicole great reflexes . [She]12-nicole reached [her]12-nicole door and inserted the key and spent the next couple of minutes wiggling it around until it finally grasped the mechanisms inside the knob and turned . [She]12-nicole rushed inside , quickly relocking the door . [She]12-nicole breathed a sigh of relief as [she]12-nicole entered the safety of [[her]12-nicole apartment]112-her apartment . [She]12-nicole ’d seriously be in trouble if [someone]92-someone was ever chasing [her]12-nicole because [she]12-nicole certainly would n’t be able to get inside quickly enough to save [herself]12-nicole . [Nicole]12-nicole looked around [the worn out studio apartment]114-the worn out studio apartment in disgust . [It]114-the worn out studio apartment was scarcely furnished with second hand furniture , which had seen much better days . [She]12-nicole tried to make [[her]12-nicole place]115-her place as homey as possible but with [her]12-nicole very limited budget there was n’t very much [she]12-nicole could do . [She]12-nicole opened [her]12-nicole refrigerator , only to spot the empty shelves and shut it back up . [She]12-nicole was exhausted and only had a few hours to sleep before [she]12-nicole had to report to [her]12-nicole temporary job . [She]12-nicole was so exhausted [she]12-nicole could barely stand on [her]12-nicole feet . [She]12-nicole was working about twenty hours a day , six days a week , plus a few hours on [her]12-nicole seventh day . [She]12-nicole could n’t wait until [she]12-nicole found a permanent , full - time job so [she]12-nicole could actually have some decent hours . Between [her]12-nicole jobs and visiting with [[her]12-nicole sister]116-her sister in [the hospital]117-the hospital [she]12-nicole knew [she]12-nicole looked like [a complete wreck]118-a complete wreck . [She]12-nicole fell face first on [her]12-nicole bed and was n’t happy when [her]12-nicole telephone woke [her]12-nicole up a short hour later . [She]12-nicole crawled from the bed to pick it up because [she]12-nicole knew it had to be important . “ Hello , ”[12-nicole] [she]12-nicole croaked into the phone . “ [We]1353-we ’re looking for [Nicole Lander]12-nicole , ”[119-the voice on the other end of the line] said [the voice on the other end of the line]119-the voice on the other end of the line . “ This is [Nicole]12-nicole , how can [I]12-nicole help [you]12-nicole ? ”[12-nicole] [she]12-nicole replied , a bit more awake . “ [We]1353-we have prescreened [you]12-nicole for a full - time job and think [you]12-nicole ’d be perfect for the position , ”[120-the woman] [the woman]120-the woman said . When [she]12-nicole got the call the next day , [she]12-nicole hung [her]12-nicole head and barely managed to hold the tears back . [Someone else]135-someone else had gotten the position . [She]12-nicole was running out of options . It was n’t much motivation but it was better than nothing . Three months later , [Nicole]12-nicole sat by [her]12-nicole phone trying to work up [her]12-nicole courage . Then [she]12-nicole could just leave a message and not have to face hearing [his]7-ryan voice . “ Who is this ? ”[7-ryan] a voice demanded , startling [her]12-nicole . “ Th … this is [Nicole]12-nicole , ”[12-nicole] [she]12-nicole stuttered . Chapter Five “ So [I]22-jasmine know it ’s completely over the top but [we]647-this family have [a hair stylist]1496-a hair stylist and [a make - up artist]1497-a make - up artist coming in tomorrow . [The two women]577-the two women dragged [Nicole]12-nicole up the stairs for [their]577-the two women night of beauty to begin . After several hours of beauty treatment [her]12-nicole skin felt like smooth satin and [her]12-nicole face was still tingling from whatever they ’d plastered all over [her]12-nicole . [She]12-nicole felt attractive and mellow and [she]12-nicole was incredibly nervous for the next day .
